testInfo.description: Тест на союзы and, but, or, so, because, although, however

questions.question: Choose the correct conjunction: I like tea ___ coffee.
Fill in the blank: She didn't go to work ___ she was ill.
Choose the correct conjunction: It was raining, ___ we stayed at home.
Fill in the blank: Would you like tea ___ coffee?
Fill in the blank: ___ it was cold, we went for a walk.
Choose the correct conjunction: He studied hard, ___ he failed the exam.
Fill in the blank: I want to go to the party, ___ I have too much work.
Fill in the blank: She was tired, ___ she continued working.
Choose the correct sentence:
options: Although it was late, but we continued.
Although it was late, we continued.
It was late, although we continued.
It was late, we continued although.
questions.correctAnswer: Although it was late, we continued.
